name: Country Park
title: Lantau North (Extension) Country Park
detail: Well-established secondary woodlands, shrubland, grassland and fresh water habitats of high conservation and landscape value

name: Ecologically Important Stream
title: Wong Lung Hang, Lantau / Tung Chung (Mok Ka and Shek Mun Kap) / Tai Ho, Lantau Ecologically Important Streams
detail: Diverse aquatic fauna and freshwater fish.

name: Priority Site
title: Tai Ho Priority Site
detail: For enhanced conservation under New Nature Conservation Policy

4 major habitat types
  • natural stream
  • mangrove stand / mudflat
  • agricultural land
  • woodland

name: Marine Park
title: The Brothers Marine Park
detail: For the protection and enhancement of Chinese White Dolphin habitats and feeding grounds
